# ovh_iploadbalancing_nat_ips (Data Source)

Retrieve the IP subnet used by OVHcloud IPLB to contact your backends.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ovh_iploadbalancing_nat_ips" "iplb" {
  service_name = "iplb-example-1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `service_name` (String) The service name of your IP load balancing

### Read-Only

- `nat_ips` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--iploadbalancing_nat_ips))

<a id="nestedatt--iploadbalancing_nat_ips"></a>
### Nested Schema for `nat_ips`

Read-Only:

- `ip` (List of String)
- `zone` (String)
